description: Details of Post-Construction Energy Use Monitoring part pursuant to condition 39 part discharge (part 39A - 'be seen' energy performance indicators) of planning permission ref: 224371FUL dated 13/09/2023 for: Redevelopment of the Site including the erection of 6 residential buildings ranging in height from ground +1 to ground + 16 floors to provide a total of 300 new homes (use class C3) (affordable and private), with public and private amenity spaces including roof top gardens and play spaces; servicing; disabled car parking; bike and bin stores; resident gym; concierge and associated spaces. With associated highways works, and landscaping works along Western Avenue
site_name: Land Between Park View And Cloister Road
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
